t: Amazon 101: Amazon Brand Store Product Collections Guide - MindgruveMacarta
s: January 29, 2024 - Each grouping of products can contain 60 items maximum that must be related, whether it be by category, interest, a new product line, seasonal items, etc. Brands are allowed to add up to five collections per page — a step up from the product grid tile that only allows one grid per page.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Goodthreads is a menswear apparel line available to Amazon Prime members. The line offers both casual and professional pieces and is said to act as an alternative to more expensive competitors like J. Crew, Banana Republic, GANT and Brooks Brothers. 206 Collective is a shoe line for men and women.

t: Introducing product collections on Stores | Amazon Ads
s: July 1, 2022 - Product collection is a new tile found in Store Builder that allows brands to showcase curated, related groupings of products. Instead of listing ASINs in one product grid per page, a product collection allows brands to add up to five curated collections on the same page.

t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 4 days ago - The brand is beloved by celebrities like Kendall Jenner, and many of their items have gone viral. You can find fashion-forward one-pieces that are designed for every body type or get unique bikinis in a wide range of different colors. Calzedonia also has cover-ups that double as fashionable dresses. Prepare for a summer you won’t forget with dozens of swimwear options from Calzedonia’s Amazon collection...

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: It's Our Job to Shop: These Are the Amazon Brands to Keep on Your Radar
s: The Drop is an Amazon-exclusive brand that keeps its finger firmly on the pulse of what’s trending now. With a mix of beautiful basics and limited-edition, influencer-curated collections, this is the perfect place to refresh your seasonal wardrobe and score pieces you’ll return to repeatedly.
